column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////So many pretty pastries! Didn't know what to get my first time here
column2: but I was most interested in the breads. An employee gave me some recommendations and I went with the seeded baguette! At $3.50
column5: I know it'll last me all week. I was there mostly to do some studying
column6: and it was a nice ambiance for that. Will def be back soon to try their desserts and croissants!
